com.uwsoft.editor.renderer.resources

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uwsoft.editor.renderer.resources.ResourceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAssetLoader, IDataLoader, IResourceLoader, IResourceRetriever

    public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IResourceLoader, IResourceRetriever
    Default ResourceManager that you can reuse or extend Generally is good to load all the assets that are exported from editor using default settings (The paths and file structure should be exact) If changed by you manually, please override this class methods in order to keep it working. The main logic is to prepare list of resources that needs to be load for specified scenes, and then loaded. Created by azakhary on 9/9/2014.

      Following methods are for retriever interface, which is intended for runtime internal use to retrieve any already loaded into memory asset for rendering
      void initAllResources()
      Easy use loader Iterates through all scenes and schedules all for loading Prepares all the assets to be loaded that are used in scheduled scenes finally loads all the prepared assets
      void initScene(java.lang.String sceneName)
      Initializes scene by loading it's VO data object and loading all the assets needed for this particular scene only
      void loadAssets()
      Loads all the scheduled assets into memory including main atlas pack, particle effects, sprite animations, spine animations and fonts
      void loadAtlasPack() 
      void loadFont(FontSizePair pair) 
      void loadFonts() 
      void loadParticleEffects() 
      ProjectInfoVO loadProjectVO() 
      SceneVO loadSceneVO(java.lang.String sceneName) 
      void loadSpineAnimation(java.lang.String name) 
      void loadSpineAnimations() 
      void loadSpriteAnimations() 
      void prepareAssetsToLoad()
      Creates the list of uniqe assets used in all of the scheduled scenes, removes all the duplicates, and makes list of assets that are only needed.
      void scheduleScene(java.lang.String name)
      Schedules scene for later loading if later prepareAssetsToLoad function will be called it will only prepare assets that are used in scheduled scene
      void setWorkingResolution(java.lang.String resolution)
      Sets working resolution, please set before doing any loading
      void unLoadScene(java.lang.String sceneName)
      Anloads scene from the memory, and clears all the freed assets

      void unScheduleScene(java.lang.String name)

        public void setWorkingResolution(java.lang.String resolution)
        Sets working resolution, please set before doing any loading
        Parameters:
        resolution - String resolution name, default is "orig" later use resolution names created in editor

      • unLoadScene

        Parameters:

      • scheduleScene

        public void scheduleScene(java.lang.String name)
        Schedules scene for later loading if later prepareAssetsToLoad function will be called it will only prepare assets that are used in scheduled scene
        Parameters:
        name - - scene file name without ".dt" extension
